info.description:
As a fan of both the manga Negima! and of shrinking/giantess stories, I've been thinking about starting a Negima shrinking interactive. Now that I've created one, I hope to have everyone's support in making this shrinking interactive one of the best.

For those of you who don't know, Negima! is a manga about a Ten-year old wizard named Negi Springfield who become a teacher at an all-girls school in Japan, following the adventures of him and the rather unusual class 3-A. For information about the characters:
http://negima.wikia.com/wiki/Characters#Main_characters:_Mahora_Girls.27_Jr._Hig...

Note that this is primarily a SHRINKING interactive. I might consider adding a giantess section later on, but for now I'd like to keep it as a shrinking story.

Things I like/allow
-m/F
-f/F
-Butt
-Breasts
-Mouth play
-Vore (non-lethal)
-Insertion
-Feet (Don't care much for it, but I'll allow it, just leave a thread open)
-Gentle/Playful interaction
-Justified violent interaction

Things I will NOT allow
-Extended interaction between shrunken people and normal sized males
-Unjustified violence
-Excessive OOCness
-Killing main characters
-Random tangents
-Threads that end too quickly
-Unacceptably poor spelling/grammar (I won't delete posts if I can edit it into something reasonable)

I will give 100-500 GP for quality additions. Hopefully I should be able to update this story more often than my previous interactive, but I am counting on additions from other writers to help this interactive reach it's full potential.
